column1: (A) Caden thinks there is a leak in the roof.

(Option B) Yolanda believes the model car is on the top shelf.
(A) Ivy believes the cat's fur is soft and shiny.
(Option 1) Mae believes the worm is big and juicy.
(Option A) Wet and easy to shape.
